snippet.title: ✅  Amber Heard admits she lied to mum about 'Jekyll & Hyde' Johnny Depp hitting her
snippet.description:
💖 Please Visit: https://www.facebook.com/Scathc/
💖 Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQju4Bo1Tjk9SzhHQDknWaw?sub_confirmation=1
✍  Amber Heard has admitted she lied to her mum about "Jekyll and Hyde"  hitting her during their relationship.  Heard, 34, is back at London's High Court today after three days giving evidence in Depp 's libel case against News Group Newspapers.  It is believed to be her final turn in the witness box, while Heard's sister Whitney is expected to take over this afternoon.  Depp, 57, is suing NGN over a story published in The Sun in 201 which branded him a "wife beater" - a claim which he strenuously denies.  He previously spent three days in the witness box during which he denied ever being violent towards his ex Heard and claiming she was abusive towards him throughout their relationship.  During today's testimony, text messages between Heard and her mum Paige Parsons, who died in May, sent in 2013 were read out in court.  One text from Heard, read out in court, stated: "He is not being violent to me. He is just raging in general."   Another read: "Dealing with Johnny's spiral. It's terr ...
💖 #JohnnyDepp, #PiratesoftheCaribbean, #AmberHeard
